name: Pengi is Hungy
description:
I made this little project in five hours a challenge for myself. I did all the sound, artwork, and programming from scratch. Made with Godot.

You are Pengi, a husband, father, and provider; like all creatures, you and your family need to eat to survive. Nature has decreed that you must hunt for your food.

Controls:

WASD for movement

Left-click to throw a spear

Right-click to throw bolas

Middle-click to lay a trap
